name: Stench Projector, Recoilless (RSPj-13)
description: Recoilless version of the stench projector. The stench projector projects a foul-smelling or obnoxious effect at the target.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
